title: Configure Project Rules
summary:
Configure agent rules for the detected technology stack.

Detected Stack:
- TypeScript (language)

Strategy:
1. Review the detected stack above.
2. For each relevant item, use the templates in `.dev_ops/templates/rules/` to create rules in `.agent/rules/` (or `.cursor/rules/`).
3. Customize the rules to match project conventions (naming, patterns, etc.).
